headline: Survey Reveals Robust Public Support for Better Alternatives to Help Reduce Smoking
summary: STAMFORD, Conn., September 25, 2025--A new international survey conducted by Povaddo and commissioned by Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE: PM) reveals strong global support for smoke-free alternatives to cigarettes and growing worries about how public health decisions are made.
